question: Consider the following statements about Kaziranga National Park 1.Wild Water Buffalo is only found in Kaziranga National Park. 2.It is a World Heritage Site. 3.Kaziranga is recognized as an Important Bird Area. Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Kaziranga National Park hosts two-thirds of the worldâ€™s great one-horned rhinoceroses. It is a World Heritage Site. It has the largest population of the Wild water buffalo anywhere accounting for about 57% of the world population.
